00019 #include "DataSetTest_LargeData.h"
00020 #include "GenericData.h"

00026 using namespace std;

00029 // NOTE:
00030 // Requires the exsitance of a large DAT file in affy/sdk/calvin_files/data/data.
00031 // This test is not included in the build because the file is not in CVS.
00032 #define TEST_DATA_LARGE_DAT "../data/large_DAT_file"
00033 
00034 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetTest_LargeData );
00035 
00036 DataSetTest_LargeData::DataSetTest_LargeData()
00037 {
00038         data = 0;
00039         dataPlane = 0;
00040 }
00041 
00042 DataSetTest_LargeData::~DataSetTest_LargeData()
00043 {
00044 
00045 }
00046 
00047 void DataSetTest_LargeData::setUp()
00048 {
00049         data = new GenericData;
00050         GenericFileReader reader;
00051         std::string name = TEST_DATA_LARGE_DAT;
00052         reader.SetFilename(name);
00053         try
00054         {
00055                 reader.ReadHeader(*data);
00056                 dataPlane = data->DataSet(0,0);
00057         }
00058         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00059         {
00060                 dataPlane = 0;
00061         }
00062 }
00063 
00064 void DataSetTest_LargeData::tearDown()
00065 {
00066         if (dataPlane)
00067                 dataPlane->Delete();
00068         delete data;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void DataSetTest_LargeData::CreationTest()
00072 {
00073         // Check that the DataSet was created.
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00075 }
00076 
00077 // A bug was discovered where requesting
00078 // more than 200MB in GetDataRaw on a
00079 // DataSet with one column (like a DAT)
00080 // caused a crash.
00081 void DataSetTest_LargeData::GetDataRaw300MBTest()
00082 {
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00085 
00086         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00087         int32_t cols = dataPlane->Cols();
00088 
00089         int32_t threeHundredMB = 150000000; // 2 bytes per pixel = 300 MB
00090         u_int16_t* values = new u_int16_t[threeHundredMB];
00091 
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetDataRaw(0, 0, threeHundredMB, values));
00093 
00094         // Check the values
00095         u_int16_t inten = 10;
00096         for (int32_t row = 0; row < 150000000; ++row, ++inten)
00097         {
00098                 if (inten > 46000)
00099                 {
00100                         inten = 0;
00101                 }
00102 
00103                 // Spot check
00104                 if (row % 99 == 0)
00105                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(inten == values[row]);                   
00106 
00107                 // Check at the 200MB boundary.
00108                 if (row >= 99999990 && row < 100000010)
00109                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(inten == values[row]);
00110         }
00111 
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00113 
00114 }
00115 
00116 // A similar problem to the GetDataRaw
00117 // bug above exists in GetData that returns
00118 // a vector.
00119 void DataSetTest_LargeData::GetData300MBTest()
00120 {
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataPlane->Open() == true);
00123 
00124         int32_t rows = dataPlane->Rows();
00125         int32_t cols = dataPlane->Cols();
00126 
00127         int32_t threeHundredMB = 150000000; // 2 bytes per pixel = 300MB
00128         Uint16Vector v;
00129 
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->GetData(0, 0, threeHundredMB, v));
00131 
00132                 // Check the values
00133         u_int16_t inten = 10;
00134         for (int32_t row = 0; row < 150000000; ++row, ++inten)
00135         {
00136                 if (inten > 46000)
00137                 {
00138                         inten = 0;
00139                 }
00140 
00141                 // Spot check
00142                 if (row % 99 == 0)
00143                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(inten == v[row]);                        
00144 
00145                 // Check at the 200MB boundary.
00146                 if (row >= 99999990 && row < 100000010)
00147                         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(inten == v[row]);
00148         }
00149 
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dataPlane->Close());
00151 
00152 }
